data.actual_result: Displays standard vanity invite URL but without the slash
data.expected_result: The text should appear with the standard Discord vanity URL, with a slash before the vanity invite
data.short_description: Slash missing from vanity URL in partner server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter the Server Settings of a Discord partnered server with permissions to change the vanity URL - Enter the Vanity URL section - Notice that the slash from the invite displayed is missing
